titles.title: There is great hope in His Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is great hope in His name!
There is power to heal the sick and the lame.
He will mend the broken reed,
Nurse the dying wick to flame.
There is great, great hope,
There is great, great power,
There is great hope and power in His name!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is great hope in His name!
We shall never be the same.
For the love that conquers fear
Brings a bit of heaven here.
There is great, great hope,
There is great, great power,
There is great hope and power in His name!
